page.title: 07Robertson's Jam Factory
page.content: Robertson's was built in 1856. Today there are 764 workers employed at the Robertson's factory which is the only remaining one in Britain. There are twelve different departments in the jam works. They are fruit picking, fruit preparing,juice room,boiling house,jar dept.,filling room,exporting dept.,receiving dept.,engineering, garage and office. The main countries for providing fruit are Britain for jam and Spain for marmalade. Robertson's make 1 and a half million jars of jam a week and 86 million jars a year. They have nine lines of machines for filling the jars wth jam, marmalade and mincemeat and three machines for filling puds. They are starting to develop spreads for people on diets. The gollywog symbol was introduced to the world in 1910.
